item.title: Placeholder Blog
item.description: A consistent and responsive Hugo theme with clean typography. The primary typefaces are Open Sans, Raleway, and Ubuntu Mono. Demo / Screenshots Features Responsive Suited for blogging and personal webpages Disqus support Built-in 404 page Syntax highlighting with highlightjs (by @andy4thehuynh) Gravatar/static profile image (by @remeh) RSS feed and icon (by @mvrilo) Optimized SVG icons (by @robinst) for Instagram, 500px, and more Cache busting Google Analytics Piwik and Gitalk support Most features are optional and can be individually enabled/disabled in your config.
